directions: Squeeze the roasted garlic cloves out of their skins into the food processor bowl. Add edamame, tahini, lemon juice, and harissa; process until smooth. Add water, 1 tablespoon at a time, if the mixture seems too dry. Season with salt and pulse to combine.
Transfer hummus to a container or jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover top with a layer of olive oil to prevent the surface from drying out. Refrigerate until serving.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon water, or more as needed  (Optional)
title: Edamame Hummus
